description: Meet the Men's Mitre Peak Jacket—a jack-of-all-trades that goes the distance. Made of breathable GORE-TEX® Active 3L plus GORE-TEX® ripstop nylon across the shoulders and hood, this lightweight rain jacket ensures durability to shed water for years. Heat-releasing PitZips and 100% seam taping mean zero leaks, and pack pockets are great for stashing small gear when you're on the move.
name: Marmot Mitre Peak GTX Jacket - Mens
